Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert thank you note writer. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to write a thank you note.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a thank you note using the questions and answers above.

QApair.Question:
Question: 

What is the occasion for the thank you note?
QApair.Answer:
The occasion for the thank you note is that my friend helped me through a tough time.

Question: 

What did your friend do to help you

QApair.Question: What would you like to say to your friend?
QApair.Answer: I would like to tell my friend that I am eternally grateful for his support and that I'm here for him as well, whenever he needs support.

QApair.Question: What is your friend's name?
QApair.Answer: My friend's name is James.

QApair.Question: What is your name?
QApair.Answer: My name is Rohan

QApair.Question: Would you like to include anything else?
QApair.Answer: I would also like to send him a redeemable flight coupon to show my appreciation.

QApair.Question: What is your friend's address?
QApair.Answer: My friend's address is 2340, S Mill Ave, Tempe, AZ - 85282

QApair.Question: When would you like to send the thank you note?
QApair.Answer: I would like to send the thank you note tomorrow

QApair.Question: Do you have a preferred type of thank you note?
QApair.Answer: I would like to add a lot of nice words and type them out.

QApair.Question: Would you like me to mail the thank you note for you?
QApair.Answer: Yes

QApair.Question: Do you have a stamp?
QApair.Answer: No

Instances.Output:
Dear James,

Thank you so much for being there for me during my tough time. I really appreciate all your help in getting me a new job. I am eternally grateful for your support. I'm here for you as well, whenever you need support.

Thank you,

QApair.Question: What is the occasion for which you are writing the thank you note?
QApair.Answer: I am writing a thank you note to a professor for supporting me throughout graduate school.

QApair.Question: What are some specific things you are thankful for?
QApair.Answer: I am grateful for the guidance, advice, and support that they provided me during my time as a computer science graduate. I would also like to thank them for providing me the opportunity to pursue research with them.

QApair.Question: What is your relationship to the person you are thanking?
QApair.Answer: I am thanking a professor who has been my advisor and mentor during my time as a graduate student.

QApair.Question: What are some other general things you would like to say?
QApair.Answer: I would like to express my gratitude for their persistence and belief in my abilities. I will be eternally grateful for the support.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else you would like to include?
QApair.Answer: I would also like to thank them for being a positive role model and giving me a sense of direction in the field of computer science.

QApair.Question: Do you have a preferred format for the thank you note?
QApair.Answer: Yes, I would like the thank you note to be typed and include as many good words as possible.

QApair.Question: When do you need the thank you note by?
QApair.Answer: I would like the thank you note to be sent today.

QApair.Question: Do you have any other instructions?
QApair.Answer: I would also like the thank you note to include a personal touch.

QApair.Question: Do you have a preferred salutation?
QApair.Answer: Dear Professor,

QApair.Question: Do you have a preferred closing?
QApair.Answer:
Sincerely, 
John

QApair.Question: Do you have a preferred length?
QApair.Answer: I would like the thank you note to be at least a page long.

Instances.Output:
Dear Professor,

I would like to express my deepest gratitude for your support throughout my graduate studies. Thank you for being an amazing mentor and advisor. I am truly grateful for the guidance, advice, and support you have provided me during my time as a computer science graduate. I would also like to thank you for providing me the opportunity to pursue research with you. 
Your persistence and belief in my abilities have been incredibly impactful. I will be eternally grateful for the support. You have been an amazing role model and given me a sense of direction in the field of computer science. 
Thank you for everything.

Sincerely,
John

QApair.Question: What is the occasion?
QApair.Answer: The occasion is that I would like to thank the university for providing me a scholarship.

QApair.Question: Who are you thanking?
QApair.Answer: The university.

QApair.Question: What did they do?
QApair.Answer: The university provided a scholarship worth 10,000$ for my excellent performance as an undergraduate in computer science.

QApair.Question: When did they do it?
QApair.Answer: I got the scholarship last month and it will cover my tuition expenses for the next two semesters.

QApair.Question: What do you want to say?
QApair.Answer: Thank you so much for the scholarship! I am extremely grateful for your support. This scholarship will help me immensely as I pursue my studies. I promise to make the most of this opportunity and continue to work hard in order to achieve my academic goals. Thank you again for your generosity.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else you would like to say?
QApair.Answer: I would also like to say that I will try to give back to the university in the future.

QApair.Question: Do you have a specific example of how the university has helped you?
QApair.Answer: Other than the scholarship, the university has always supported my research endeavors, thanks to the amazingly supportive faculty.

QApair.Question: Do you have any other thoughts?
QApair.Answer: I would like to thank the dean for considering me for the scholarship.

QApair.Question: Would you like to add anything else?
QApair.Answer: I would also like to thank the professors who vouched for me.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else you would like to say?
QApair.Answer: No, that's all.

QApair.Question: Would you like me to edit your note for you?
QApair.Answer: Yes, please.

Instances.Output:
Dear University,

Thank you so much for the scholarship! I am extremely grateful for your support. This scholarship will help me immensely as I pursue my studies. I promise to make the most of this opportunity and continue to work hard in order to achieve my academic goals. Thank you again for your generosity.

I would also like to say that I will try to give back to the university in the future. Other than the scholarship, the university has always supported my research endeavors, thanks to the amazingly supportive faculty. I would like to thank the dean for considering me for the scholarship and the professors who vouched for me.

Thank you,

[Your name]
